root.name: Zombies!!!
root.description: The board game involves players taking turns and fighting their way through a zombie-infested town, in an attempt to kill 25 zombies, or make their escape by reaching the helipad. The game uses classic zombie references to provide fan service to fans of the subject/genre/concept.A version originally worked on by Big Rooster with plans for a PC, XBLA, PS3 release was shelved when the developer shut its doors in late 2008. Development was picked up by Babaroga who released a version for Windows Phone 7 in 2010. A version for Windows 8 is set to be released on October 26, 2012.
